AT.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
AT.description: In YO-KAI WATCH geht es um geheimnisvolle, manchmal niedliche, manchmal unheimliche und meistens neckische Yo-kai, die versteckt in unserer Welt leben. Sie verbergen sich überall! Viele von ihnen machen Leuten das alltägliche Leben schwer, und so musst du ein Team von sechs Yo-kai zusammenstellen, das du rufen kannst, wann immer du dessen Hilfe benötigst. Jeder Yo-kai hat seinen eigenen Charakter und seine persönlichen Fähigkeiten, daher musst du strategisch vorgehen, um mit deinem Team verschiedene Probleme anzugehen und böse Yo-kai zu bekämpfen!

BG.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
BG.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. Every Yo-kai has a unique personality and abilities, so it will take some strategy to form and change your team to address various problems and fight evil Yo-kai!

BE.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
BE.description: YO-KAI WATCH est un jeu sur ces mystérieux, parfois mignons, parfois effrayants mais surtout espiègles Yo-kai qui peuplent secrètement notre monde. Ils se cachent partout ! Beaucoup d’entre eux créent des problèmes dans la vie quotidienne des gens. Vous devez donc rassembler une équipe de six Yo-kai et les appeler quand vous avez besoin de leur aide. Chaque Yo-kai a une personnalité unique et des capacités spécifiques, il vous faudra donc faire preuve de stratégie pour former et changer votre équipe selon les problèmes et vaincre les Yo-kai malveillants !

ES.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
ES.description: YO-KAI WATCH es un juego que trata sobre los Yo-kai, unos seres a veces adorables, a veces terroríficos y a veces traviesos que habitan en secreto en nuestro mundo. ¡Se esconden en todas partes! Muchos de ellos están causando problemas en la vida cotidiana de la gente, así que deberás formar un equipo de seis Yo-kai y acudir a ellos cuando necesites su ayuda. Cada Yo-kai tiene una personalidad y habilidades únicas, por lo que necesitarás llevar a cabo estrategias a la hora de crear y modificar tu equipo para poder hacer frente a diversos problemas y derrotar a los Yo-kai malvados.

FI.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
FI.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! HU.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
HU.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. IT.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
IT.description: YO-KAI WATCH è un gioco sugli Yo-kai, degli esseri misteriosi (talvolta teneri, talvolta spaventosi e spesso dispettosi) che popolano segretamente il nostro mondo. Sono nascosti dovunque! Molti di loro interferiscono con la vita quotidiana degli esseri umani, causando un sacco di problemi, quindi avrai bisogno di mettere insieme un team di sei Yo-kai da cui farti aiutare a risolverli. Ogni Yo-kai ha una sua personalità e delle abilità ben distinte: sarà necessaria un po' di strategia per formare la squadra perfetta, modificandola di volta in volta per affrontare i vari problemi e combattere gli Yo-kai malvagi!

LT.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
LT.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. NO.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
NO.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. Every Yo-kai has a unique personality and abilities, so it will take some strategy to form and change your team to address various problems and fight evil Yo-kai!

NL.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
NL.description: YO-KAI WATCH is een spel over de mysterieuze, soms schattige, soms enge en meestal ondeugende Yo-kai die in het geheim in onze wereld wonen. Ze verstoppen zich overal! Velen veroorzaken problemen in het dagelijks leven van mensen, dus moet je een team van zes Yo-kai samenstellen en ze oproepen wanneer je hun hulp nodig hebt. Alle Yo-kai hebben unieke persoonlijkheden en vaardigheden, dus het vergt wat strategie om je team samen te stellen en aan te passen om verschillende problemen aan te pakken en tegen kwaadaardige Yo-kai te vechten!

PL.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
PL.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. Every Yo-kai has a unique personality and abilities, so it will take some strategy to form and change your team to address various problems and fight evil Yo-kai!

PT.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
PT.description: YO-KAI WATCH é um jogo sobre os misteriosos, por vezes amorosos, por vezes assustadores e frequentemente traquinas Yo-kai, que vivem secretamente no nosso mundo. Eles escondem-se em todo o lado! Muitos deles estão a causar problemas nas vidas das pessoas, por isso terá de formar uma equipa de seis Yo-kai e chamá-los sempre que precisar da sua ajuda. Cada Yo-kai tem uma personalidade e habilidades únicas, por isso será preciso alguma estratégia para formar e fazer alterações na sua equipa para resolver os diversos desafios e derrotar os Yo-kai malvados!

RU.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
RU.description: YO-KAI WATCH — это игра о загадочных, иногда милых, а иногда страшноватых и вредных существах ёкай, тайно обитающих посреди нас. Они скрываются повсюду! Многие из них доставляю много хлопот в повседневной жизни людей, потому вам придется собрать команду из шести ёкай, которые всегда готовы прийти вам на помощь. Каждый ёкай имеет уникальную личность и умения, так что вам придется применять тактический подход – создавая команду и изменяя ее для каждого отдельного задания – в боях против злых ёкай.

SE.name: YO-KAI WATCH®
SE.description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help.
